mapper.select: select A.ID, A.NAME, A.GENDER, A.SCHOOL, A.GRADE, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(A.BIRTHDAY) BIRTHDAY, B.NAME AS GROUP_NAME, B.LEADER AS GROUP_LEADER, C.NAME AS WORSHIP_NAME, D.WEEKDAY AS CARE_WEEKDAY, D.STIME AS CARE_STIME, D.ETIME AS CARE_ETIME from people A left join PEOPLE_GROUP B on A.GROUP_ID = B.ID left join WORSHIP C on A.WORSHIP = C.ID left join CARE_TIME D on A.ID = D.PID where A.ID = #{peopleId}
select A.PID, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(A.CHKIN_TIME) AS CHKIN_TIME, B.NAME as WORSHIP_NAME, A.NOTE from present_worship A left join worship B on A.ACTIVITY_ID = B.ID WHERE A.PID = #{peopleId}

select B.NAME as CREATE_NAME, A.STATEMENT, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(A.CREATE) AS CREATE_TIME, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(A.LAST_UPDATE) AS LAST_UPDATE, A.NOTE from statement A left join people B on A.ID = B.ID WHERE A.ID = #{peopleId}
select B.ID from worship B where B.WEEKDAY = DAYOFWEEK(NOW()) and DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%H%i') BETWEEN B.START_CHECKIN AND B.STOP_CHECKIN and B.EDU = (select EDU from people where ID = #{peopleId})

Select YEAR(CHKIN_TIME) AS YEAR_VALUE, MONTH(CHKIN_TIME) AS MONTH_VALUE, CEILING(FLOOR(DAYOFMONTH(CHKIN_TIME)-1)/7)+1 AS WEEK_VALUE, COUNT(*) worshCount, CHKIN_TIME from present_worship where CHKIN_TIME BETWEEN '2015-05-01 16:50:48' AND '2016-09-06 16:07:17' GROUP BY YEAR(CHKIN_TIME) , MONTH(CHKIN_TIME) , CEILING(FLOOR(DAYOFMONTH(CHKIN_TIME)-1)/7)+1 ORDER BY CHKIN_TIME;
